list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: measuring a great distance from end to end.
lasting or taking a great amount of time.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một sự nghiệp lâu dài và nổi bật

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a vowel) categorized as long with regard to quality and length is long (e.g. in standard British English the vowel /uː/ in food is long as distinct from the short vowel /ʊ/ in good ).
(of odds or a chance) reflecting or representing a low level of probability.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: CHIẾN THẮNG chống lại tỷ lệ cược dài

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of shares, bonds, or other assets) bought in advance, with the expectation of a rise in price.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: an industry that seems long on ideas but short on cash
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một ngành công nghiệp có vẻ dài về ý tưởng nhưng rút ngắn tiền mặt

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a long sound such as a long signal in Morse code or a long vowel or syllable.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chúng tôi đã không biết họ lâu

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (with reference to the ball in sports) at, to, or over a great distance, or further than expected or intended.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the quarterback dropped back and threw the ball long
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Quý hồi thả lại và ném bóng dài

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: have a strong wish or desire.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she longed for a little more excitement
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô khao khát một chút phấn khích hơn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (added to nouns) for the duration of.
